sentences: In its meeting of 26 January 2011, the Supervisory Council of the Bank of Albania reviewed and approved the Monetary Policy Report for the second half of 2010.

Following a thorough analysis of Albania's latest economic and financial developments and discussions on performance outlook, the Supervisory Council of the Bank of Albania decided to keep the key interest rate unchanged at 5.00%.
The Council holds that current monetary conditions are appropriate for meeting the medium-term inflation target.
I will proceed with a brief overview of economic developments and key issues discussed at today's meeting that led to this decision.
